mapper.update: update b_allot set billid=billid ,billcode=#{billcode} ,billkind=#{billkind} ,outstorageid=#{outstorageid} ,instorageid=#{instorageid} ,grainid=#{grainid} ,grainattrid=#{grainattrid} ,producingyear=#{producingyear} ,facqty=#{facqty} ,waterrate=#{waterrate} ,waterdedurate=#{waterdedurate} ,waterdeduqty=#{waterdeduqty} ,impurate=#{impurate} ,impudedurate=#{impudedurate} ,impudeduqty=#{impudeduqty} ,allotqty=#{allotqty} ,allotreason=#{allotreason} ,grossweight=#{grossweight} ,gwopid=#{gwopid} ,gwsate=#{gwsate} ,gwtime=#{gwtime} ,tareweight=#{tareweight} ,tareopid=#{tareopid} ,tarestate=#{tarestate} ,taretime=#{taretime} ,weightype=#{weightype} ,truckid=#{truckid} ,trucknum=#{trucknum} ,packageid=#{packageid} ,packqty=#{packqty} ,packunitwgt=#{packunitwgt} ,packweight=#{packweight} ,packtype=#{packtype} ,remark=#{remark} where billid=#{billid}

update b_allot set billid=billid ,billcode=#{billcode} ,billdate=#{billdate} ,billstate=#{billstate} ,billkind=#{billkind} ,groupid=#{groupid} ,companyid=#{companyid} ,graindepotid=#{graindepotid} ,createuserid=#{createuserid} ,createtime=#{createtime} where 1=1 and billid in (${Where_IdsStr}) and billid =#{Where_Id} and billid=#{Where_billid} and billcode=#{Where_billcode} and
